tag_list: seo--seo-analyst, internet-marketing, sem, ppc, web-analyst, search-engine-optimizer, seo-consultant, seo-professional, online-marketing-professionals
overview:
Abdul Malick is working as a Senior SEO Analyst and Internet Marketing Professional in Chennai India. As an SEO Specialist:

  • Domain name selection (with Keywords)
  • Website analysis and Research
  • Competitor analysis
  • Keyword research and suggestion
  • Content integration.
  • Software Tools for keyword research: Overture (Yahoo), Adwords (Google), Word tracker.
  • Set up Keyword phrases to <title>, <keyword> and <Description> for the specific page.
  • Design the Navigational structure of the website to allow spiders.
  • Robots.txt creation
  • Sitemap creation and link page structure.
  • Search engine and directory submissions
  • Article submissions and Press releases.
  • Forums and Blogs
  • Google Webmaster tools and Google Website optimizer analysis
  • Google Local listing for Geo target.
  • Google Base for products
  • Link Exchange Campaign
  • Ad words, Ad sense
  • Web Analytics
  • SEO Tools : WebCEO, SEO Elite, Advanced Web Ranking tools, IBP tool and more online SEO tools for research and report generation.

As an Email Marketer:

  • Email Marketing Management.
  • Email Lists database - More then 10 Lakhs Email ids
  • Email marketing Software
  • Creating Email NewsLetter Templates
  • SMS Marketing Softwares
  • Email Extract software
  • Email campaign and SMS campaign

As an Internet Marketer:

  • Online Bidding
  • Social networking and bookmarking
  • Social Media Optimization (SMO)
  • Video and slide presentation marketing’
  • Ebook marketings
  • Brand name marketing
  • PPC campaign
  • Marketing place and auction site managements
  • Forums advertisements

relationships.title: Senior SEO Analyst and Internet Marketer
